mapper.select:
SELECT p.product_id, p.category_id, c.name AS category_name, p.name, p.description, MIN(s.price) AS min_sku_price, p.status FROM et_product p JOIN et_category c ON c.category_id = p.category_id JOIN et_product_sku s ON s.product_id = p.product_id AND s.deleted_at IS NULL WHERE p.deleted_at IS NULL AND p.status IN ('ON_SALE', 'SOLD_OUT')
AND p.category_id = #{categoryId}
AND p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
GROUP BY p.product_id
ORDER BY
min_sku_price ASC min_sku_price DESC p.name ASC p.created_at ASC p.product_id DESC
LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT
FROM et_product p JOIN et_category c ON c.category_id = p.category_id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId} AND p.deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT s.sku_id, s.price, s.stock, s.status, so.option_value_id FROM et_product_sku s JOIN et_product_sku_option so ON so.sku_id = s.sku_id WHERE s.product_id = #{productId} AND s.deleted_at IS NULL
